channel.title: Comments on: Replacing Battery in Apple MacBook Pro Retina (Late 2012)
channel.description: Intermediate in flow properties between solids and liquids; highly viscous.

item.title: By: sacha
item.dc:creator: sacha
item.description: hi, i am considering to replace myself my battery, how is yours doing after 2 years? is it still good?
item.content:encoded: hi, i am considering to replace myself my battery, how is yours doing after 2 years? is it still good?

item.title: By: Steven A. Cholewiak
item.dc:creator: Steven A. Cholewiak
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2017/01/13/replacing-battery-in-apple-macbook-pro-retina-late-2012/#comment-213236">Steve</a>.
Yep, still working. Here are the current stats (currently 103 charge/discharge cycles): /wp-content/uploads/2017/06/2017-06-02-Macbook-Pro-Battery-Stats.png
Note that the full charge capacity has decreased 800mAh from when I initially installed the battery.
My only complaint is that I believe the adhesive included with the replacement batteries has loosened because I now have a little rattle when I shake the computer. I need to open up the machine and make sure that the batteries (and connections) are secure.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Steve.

Yep, still working. Here are the current stats (currently 103 charge/discharge cycles): /wp-content/uploads/2017/06/2017-06-02-Macbook-Pro-Battery-Stats.png

Note that the full charge capacity has decreased 800mAh from when I initially installed the battery.

My only complaint is that I believe the adhesive included with the replacement batteries has loosened because I now have a little rattle when I shake the computer. I need to open up the machine and make sure that the batteries (and connections) are secure.

item.title: By: Steve
item.dc:creator: Steve
item.description: Thanks for your informative article. I am considering the same replacement battery. Is your Brtong battery still working well months later?
item.content:encoded: Thanks for your informative article. I am considering the same replacement battery. Is your Brtong battery still working well months later?
